title: Top Places to visit in Kanker, Chhattisgarh
content:
Kanker city, a municipality, is the headquarter of Kanker District of the Indian state of Chhattisgarh.
Geography
 
The district's headquarters, Kanker town, is situated on the National Highway NH-43.Kanker town lies between Chhattisgarh's two largest cities: Chhattis
